programme.title: Landsat

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Getting There

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: From There To Here

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E05, Returning to the Carsenome with the Menoptra's isop-tope device, the Doctor and Vicki are herded into a chamber where they are enveloped in a web-like substance, what next for the Doctor.

programme.title: The Centre
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E06, The TARDIS dematerialises from the surface of Vortis. Prapillus vows that the Earth people will never be forgotten and warns that the Animus must never again be allowed to take root on the planet.

programme.title: The Executioners
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E01, Ian and Vicki are trapped by tentacled creatures on the planet Aridius. The Doctor and Barbara witness Daleks leaving Skaro on a mission to eliminate the Doctor and his companions.

programme.title: The Death of Time
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E02, The Doctor and his friends have been given shelter from the Daleks by the Aridians. But the Daleks threaten to kill the Aridians unless they hand over the time travellers.

programme.title: Flight Through Eternity
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E03, The Daleks pursue the TARDIS through time and space. In an attempt to lose the Daleks, the Doctor makes a stop on the top of the Empire State Building and then on a sailing ship.

programme.title: Journey into Terror
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E04, With the Daleks in pursuit, the TARDIS lands in what appears to be a haunted house. When the Daleks arrive, the travellers depart, not realising that they have left Vicki behind!

programme.title: The Death of Doctor Who
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E05, The Daleks follow the TARDIS to the jungle world of Mechanus which is infested with lethal plants. There the Daleks release a robot double of the Doctor that is programmed to kill.

programme.title: The Planet of Decision
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E06, The Doctor and his friends are taken prisoner by the Mechonoids. There they meet fellow prisoner, Steven Taylor. The Daleks break into the Mechonoid city and a battle commences.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E01, Ben and Polly suspect that the 'new' Doctor is really an imposter. The TARDIS lands on the planet Vulcan where a murder has been committed.

programme.category: Series, Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy

programme.title: Not Getting Married Today, Part 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E10, Hallmark Original Series. Sam and Cassie face their future together.

programme.title: Cease and Desist

programme.title: A Telling Silence
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth helps a mute student who is struggling to cope with death.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Schoolteacher Elizabeth and Constable Jack's relationship starts to heat up.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail takes in a very pregnant widow Carla Noonan to keep an eye on her.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: Exodus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E22, SG-1 joins forces with the Tok'ra in a final attempt to rid the universe of their mutual Goa'uld nemesis, Apophis. But their plan goes awry when a member of the team is captured and they find themselves at the mercy of their most feared enemy!

programme.title: Enemies
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E01, Presumed dead, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) is discovered very much alive…but still under the control of the evil Apophis (Peter Williams). Will the SG-1 team be able to rescue their friend from the clutches of Apophis or will they die trying?

programme.title: Threshold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E02, While Teal’c’s body has been saved from death on Apophis’ ship, his mind is still loyal to his Goa’uld lord. Jaffa Master Bra’tac suggests an ancient ritual to restore Teal'c's mind...a ritual fraught with danger and one which no one has survived.

programme.title: Ascension
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E03, While investigating an alien device Carter is found unconscious. Resting from suspected exhaustion, she is visited by an invisible being who holds vital secrets to the device and more. But how does she convince SG-1 that she is not delusional?

programme.title: The Fifth Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E04, When the SG-1 team reports in from a brutal mission, they discover that their fifth team member -- Lt. Tyler -- may not actually have been real. Does this mean the end of the Stargate Program? If the Pentagon's Col. Simmons has his way, it will.

programme.title: Red Sky
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E05, The SG-1 team is welcomed on K'Tau by the planet's religious leader, who takes the reddening sky concurrent with their arrival as a sign from their gods. What he doesn't know is that the reddish color is signaling the planet's impending doom!

programme.title: Rite Of Passage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E06, On the eve of her birthday, Cassandra is showing signs of mind fire, a powerful electromagnetic field triggered at puberty. Now SG-1 must find a cure to stop the life-threatening changes before she destroys herself…and the command center!

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E07, Daniel's Unas friend, Chaka (Dion Johnstone), is captured by a pre-industrial civilization that uses Unas as slaves. While attempting to free Chaka from this cruel regime, Daniel risks the safety of SG-1, and possibly the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E08, On a rescue mission to recover Russian soldiers believed missing in action on a previously undisclosed trip, the SG-1 team gets trapped in a Goa'uld tomb with a number of decomposed bodies…and a deadly alien monster with an appetite for human flesh!

programme.title: Between Two Fires
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E09, The SG-1 team returns to Tollana for the funeral of Chancellor Omoc, only to discover the rulers have reversed their policy on technology sharing and will now trade advanced weaponry with Earth. But is there a secret agenda behind the gesture?

Stargate SG-1, S05E10, SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not right—the city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.
